definitions.definition: A viral infection , caused by Human alphaherpesvirus 1 and Human alphaherpesvirus 2 , marked by painful, watery blisters in the skin or in the mucous membranes or on the genitals .

main_definition: ( medicine ) A viral infection , caused by Human alphaherpesvirus 1 and Human alphaherpesvirus 2 , marked by painful, watery blisters in the skin or in the mucous membranes or on the genitals .
